Nomshado Twala (amụrụ na Septemba 10, 1958) nke a maara site na aha egwu ya bụ Shado Twala bụ onye DJ redio South Africa
Ọ bu onye nta akụkọ, onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-emepụta redio na telivishọn nke a maara nke ọma dị ka onye ọka ikpe na SA's Got Talent
Twala bụ otu n'ime ụmụ atọ, n'ezinụlọ dị na Cape Town
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ dị ka onye na-enyere ndị isi aka na North West National Parks Board na Jazz Supermarkets
Mgbe ahụ na 1989 ọ bịara n'ihu ọha na 1989 mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ngosi kachasị mma na ntuli aka mba nke nyere ya oghere iga New York na mmemme mgbanwe iji mụtakwuo banyere ngosi.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na redio na Bop Radio na 1980s
Ọnọdụ redio ndị ọzọ gụnyere 702 Talk Radio, Radio Metro, P4 Radio, 567 Cape Talk Radio na Heart 104.9FM (nke a gbanwere aha redio P4)
N'oge a, o dekwara isiokwu maka Sunday Times, Two Tone Magazine, Tribute Magazine na Old Mutual Jazz Heritage Magazine na isiokwu ndị dị ka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, nka, na nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị.
N'afọ ndị 1990, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ, Khano Entertainment, iji zụlite nkà obodo ma mepụta egwu
Ụlọ ọrụ a nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịgbasawanye na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Afrịka
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze maka Ebrahim Rasool, onye isi ala nke Western Cape
ma rụọ ọrụ olu maka mgbasa ozi dị iche iche.
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2009, Shado ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị ọka ikpe nke asọmpi e.tv nke SA's Got Talent.
N'afọ 2011, ọ sonyeere MTN Hall of Fame, ma nọrọ na kọmitii ikpe maka Youth Radio Awards na Mbokodo Awards.
Ka ọ na-erule 2021, Twala na-elekọta azụmahịa ntụrụndụ nke ya, Black Olive Entertainment
Ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na mgbasa ozi maka Just Mesh Creative Communications.
